alert.note: Alert for Hansford; Ochiltree; Sherman (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 10 at 8:12PM CDT by NWS Amarillo
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Hansford, eastern Sherman and western Ochiltree Counties through 845 PM CDT... At 811 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 11 miles south of Hardesty to 8 miles north of Sunray. Movement was northeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Perryton, Spearman, Gruver, Waka, Morse and Farnsworth. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 1100 PM CDT for the Panhandle of Oklahoma...and the Panhandle of Texas.
